CustomField.formula: If(smartystreets__Mailing_Return_Code__c = "Confirmed", IMAGE("/img/msg_icons/confirm16.png", "Confirmed", 16, 16) & " Confirmed", /*If(and(smartystreets__Mailing_Return_Code__c = "Confirmed", or(isblank(smartystreets__Mailing_Record_Type_Description__c), not(contains("Thoroughfare:Locality:Administrative Area", smartystreets__Mailing_Record_Type_Description__c)))), IMAGE("/img/msg_icons/confirm16.png", "Confirmed", 16, 16) & " Confirmed", If(and(smartystreets__Mailing_Return_Code__c = "Confirmed", contains("Thoroughfare:Locality:Administrative Area", smartystreets__Mailing_Record_Type_Description__c)), IMAGE("/img/msg_icons/warning16.png", "Confirmed - May be Undeliverable", 16, 16) & " Confirmed - Down to the " + smartystreets__Mailing_Record_Type_Description__c,*/ If(smartystreets__Mailing_Return_Code__c = "Partial", IMAGE("/img/msg_icons/warning16.png", "Confirmed - Partially", 16, 16) & " Confirmed - Partially", If(smartystreets__Mailing_Return_Code__c = "Confirmed - By Dropping Secondary Info", IMAGE("/img/msg_icons/warning16.png", "Confirmed - By Dropping Secondary Info", 16, 16) & " Confirmed - By Dropping Secondary Info", If(smartystreets__Mailing_Return_Code__c = "Confirmed - Missing Secondary Info", IMAGE("/img/msg_icons/warning16.png", "Confirmed - Missing Secondary Info", 16, 16) & " Confirmed - Missing Secondary Info", If(smartystreets__Mailing_Return_Code__c = "Bad or Blank Address", IMAGE("/img/msg_icons/error16.png", "Blank Address", 16, 16) & " Bad or Blank Address", /* If(and(smartystreets__Mailing_Return_Code__c = "Bad or Blank Address", or(isblank(MailingStreet), and(isblank(MailingPostalCode), or(isblank(MailingState), isblank(MailingCity))))), IMAGE("/img/msg_icons/error16.png", "Blank Address", 16, 16) & " Blank Address", If(smartystreets__Mailing_Return_Code__c = "Bad or Blank Address", IMAGE("/img/msg_icons/error16.png", "Bad Address", 16, 16) & " Bad Address", */ If(smartystreets__Mailing_Return_Code__c = "Not Submitted", IMAGE("/img/msg_icons/error16.png", "Not Submitted", 16, 16) & " Not Submitted", If(smartystreets__Mailing_Return_Code__c = "Not Confirmed", IMAGE("/img/msg_icons/error16.png", "Not Confirmed", 16, 16) & " Not Confirmed", IMAGE("/img/msg_icons/info16.png", "Note Yet Verified", 16, 16) & " Not Yet Verified")))))))/*))*/
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Confirmed Not Confirmed Confirmed - By Dropping Secondary Info Confirmed - Missing Secondary Info Confirmed - May be Undeliverable Not Submitted
CustomField.label: Mailing Address Status
